entities.name: SLAItem
entities.description: Contains information about a tracked support KPI for a specific customer.

attributes.name: SLAItemId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the SLA Item.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Type a descriptive name of the service level agreement (SLA) item.

attributes.name: owningBusinessUnit
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information to describe the SLA Item

attributes.name: relatedField
attributes.description: Select the service level agreement (SLA) key performance indicator (KPI) that this SLA Item is created for.

attributes.name: SLAId
attributes.description: Unique identifier for SLA associated with SLA Item.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was last updated. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Exchange rate between the currency associated with the SLA Item record and the base currency.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version number of the SLA Item.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the SLA Item record.

attributes.name: applicableWhenXml
attributes.description: Condition for SLA item

attributes.name: successConditionsXml
attributes.description: Condition for SLA item

attributes.name: solutionId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the associated solution.

attributes.name: componentState
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: overwriteTime
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: isManaged
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: SLAItemIdUnique
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: sequenceNumber
attributes.description: Select the time zone, or UTC offset, for this address so that other people can reference it when they contact someone at this address.

attributes.name: failureAfter
attributes.description: Select how soon the success criteria must be met until the SLA item is considered failed and failure actions are initiated. The actual duration is based on the business hours as specified in the associated SLA record.

attributes.name: warnAfter
attributes.description: Select how soon the success criteria must be met before warning actions are initiated. The actual duration is based on the business hours as specified in the associated SLA record.

attributes.name: owningUser
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who owns the SLA Item record.

attributes.name: ownerId
attributes.description: Enter the user or team who owns the SLA. This field is updated every time the item is assigned to a different user.

attributes.name: workflowId
attributes.description: Workflow associated with the SLA Item.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.
